name: Columbia IT Solutions
tagline: San Antonio Managed IT Services Company
description:
Columbia IT Solutions, formerly Columbia Industries, Inc., has been involved in the IT business in Central Texas since 1997.
We started off in 1997 providing IT Services only to companies related in ownership to Columbia iT and recently began outside services.
Our goal is to be able to provide you with the best, most cost-effective solution to enhance performance and increase productivity within your organization.
